name: The Slaughter: Magdalene
description:
Canning Town, 1880.

A narrowboat sits, bound to the bank of the Thames. Inside, a painter stands at their easel, composing the figure of Mary Magdalene.

The Slaughter: Magdalene is a short interlude from the world of The Slaughter, with a play time of approximately five minutes. Enjoy a relaxing painting game, while a gentle score plays.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/356390/The_Slaughter_Act_One/
